duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and schedule patients, answer and manage busy phone system.
Verify active insurance coverage, collect patient payments, and assist with payment plans.
Answer, screen, and manage incoming telephone calls.
Maintain patient confidentiality and escalate concerns to site leads/Operations Manager.
Support manager in monitoring inventory of supplies for the office.
Meet and exceed assigned individual and departmental goals, and other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Associates degree, medical office or medical assistant degree required. Bilingual skills, Spanish speaking, required.
